name: Terrorist in Tiny Town
description:
Simple top-down game for Discord Jam 6.

Your goal is to find and assassinate a terrorist. You have limited time before the terrorist will blow up the whole town. If you'll get too close to him, he will also explode.

Use your gun to shoot him down. But be careful and don't kill any of the civilians.

You have traps, which will detect the terrorist when he is nearby.

Controls

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Set a trap
